channel.title: Anti Leech
channel.description:
I just downloaded a source in which I would like to improve and play with my friend with, but whenever I compile the server and try to login I get "ClientHandler. <PlayerName> Client Null Disconnected..
I'm positive that this is an anti leech put into the source.
I was given a hint that the 2 anti leeches are in the client.java and player.java folders. Any idea how I can fix this??
-Thanks (:

item.title: Anti Leech
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

You already have 2 topics for this which alone is not allowed for the same thing.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657794.0.html
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657749.0.html

Just bump your threads (after a reasonable amount of time) and if you have any new information on it post it there also.

Read full topic
